title: Nanoencapsulation of limonene in octenyl succinic anhydride-modified starch (OSA-ST) and maltodextrin: Investigation and comparison of physicochemical properties, efficiency and morphology of nanoparticles

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20
